item.title: Ansible Role For Local Repo
item.description: I need a local install source and system I can serve kickstart files from. I wrote an Ansible role to accomplish this. The kickstart process will be covered in the next article. Here is the relevant git commit Structure files/ # Static files centos7.repo # Sync source local.repo # Repo file for download tasks/ configure_repo.yml # Set up repo in container prepare_host_node.yml # Prepare Proxmox node main.yml # Main script main.
